programme.desc: A prison escapee and his gang are running from the police. When two young women cross their path they brutalize them, killing one and leaving the other for dead. When the gang seeks refuge from a storm, they end up at the parents' house.

programme.title: Thirteen Ghosts
programme.desc: A family inherits a wealthy uncle's estate, including a glass house filled with vicious ghosts. Now they must search for a way out the house before they become trapped forever, even beyond death.

programme.title: Halloween: Resurrection
programme.desc: In this eighth instalment, Michael Myers returns to stalk and kill a group of students who are spending Halloween night in his childhood home as part of a reality TV show.

programme.title: Halloween H2O: 20 Years Later
programme.desc: Twenty years after killings on Halloween, Laurie Strode has built a new life for herself and her son, but her psychotic brother, Michael Myers, is after her again.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Fifteen years after killing his teenage sister on Halloween, Michael Myers escapes from a mental institution, days before Halloween, and returns home where he terrorizes a young girl and her friends.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: The Raney family goes to the Ozarks, where Marty spent his childhood homesteading, and discovers a malnourished couple and a mouldy cabin that's making them sick. Massive electric storms hit, but the homestead must be built before Mother Nature wins.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: An aerial supply mission faces turbulent skies as Marty breaks ground on massive foundation posts for his cabin. Misty and Maciah begin an innovative greenhouse that requires lumber, but Matt and Katie must first troubleshoot the new sawmill.

programme.title: Building Off the Grid
programme.desc: A mother-and-son team pulls up stakes from the crowded confines of Orange County to build an off-grid family commune outside Keaau, Hawaii. With the help of a skilled aircrete instructor, the duo overcomes a learning curve to make their dreams come true.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: The Raneys must build a dam and plan an entire cabin move to help the Smith family in a Missouri flood zone.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Marty's dam is put to the test as the Raneys move an entire cabin into the flood zone. A surprise arrival of chicks has Misty needing an upgrade for her chicken coop. Matt crafts a knife blade in the Smiths' newly improved foundry.

programme.title: Mega Zoo
programme.desc: Vet Leanne races to rescue critically injured koalas from Australia's blazing bushfires. A two-tonne rhino calf named Kipenzi wreaks havoc in the zoo trucks, and the carnivore team eagerly awaits to see if snow leopard Miska reveals an exciting secret.

programme.title: Crikey! It's the Irwins
programme.desc: Steve Irwin's family carry on his legacy as they run the Australian Zoo. Caring for over 1,200 animals, overseeing a world-class wildlife hospital, and conducting global conservation expeditions, their lives are full of adventure.

programme.desc: Steve Irwin's family carry on his legacy as they run the Australian Zoo. Caring for over 1,200 animals, overseeing a world-class wildlife hospital, and conducting global conservation expeditions, their lives are full of adventure.

programme.title: The Zoo: San Diego
programme.desc: There will be no peace in the world for the hamadryas baboons until Impo finds his mate. Luckily, the San Diego Zoo keepers have a plan. Two young cheetah cubs are training to become animal ambassadors with the help of their experienced canine guide.

programme.title: The Zoo: San Diego
programme.desc: Hunter the koala is ready for a mate. Jaws the Galápagos tortoise isn't feeling well and the zoo staff works to bring him out of his shell. The Safari Park has not one but two baby giraffe calves that need to be hand-reared simultaneously.

programme.title: The Zoo: San Diego
programme.desc: The Zoo says goodbye to beloved pandas Bai-Yun and Xiao Liwu as mother and cub prepare to return to China. Tembo the retired 'Hollywood' elephant tries traditional Chinese medicine for her arthritis. The Butterfly Jungle gets colored for the season.

programme.title: The Zoo: San Diego
programme.desc: After six years away, Mek the tiger returns to the Zoo. Two shy tree kangaroos, Spike and Polly, meet for the first time. And, with the Children's Zoo under construction, the keepers have to move over 100 animals, including a herd of reluctant goats.

programme.title: The Zoo: San Diego
programme.desc: Safari Park keepers say goodbye to two elephant brothers. We find out if the San Diego Zoo vets can design a custom shoe for Felix, an excitable three-toed baird's tapir. Then, two African Penguin chicks grow up and get ready to join the colony.

programme.title: The Zoo: San Diego
programme.desc: Mkhaya, the youngest baby elephant in the Safari Park herd, learns to use her trunk. Will Alba the Andean bear become a first-time mom? Zoo vets examine Mandazzi the gorilla, and Jeff the snake chaser looks for he elusive costal patch nose snake.

programme.title: The Zoo: San Diego
programme.desc: Southern white rhino Victoria is pregnant with a calf that could be a key in saving a species from extinction. Connor the Malayan tiger has tooth trouble. A new bird keeper learns to feed the shoebill. Polar bears use their hunting skills on live prey.

programme.title: Ice Lake Rebels
programme.desc: The lack of fish and a new neighbour threaten Pike Mike's food supply and peace of mind. Stephan helps Molly install a wind turbine during an ice storm and Ragnar uses the harsh weather to locate and unearth arctic diamonds from a secret location.

programme.title: Ice Lake Rebels
programme.desc: Stephan faces a dangerous trek as ice becomes slush. Kyle and Peyton seek shelter to save their boat from ruin. Pike Mike is injured in deep woods with no place to turn for help.

programme.title: Ice Lake Rebels
programme.desc: Great Slave Lake is a minefield of melting ice. A truck sinks into the lake, Stephan and Allyce cut their boat free and keep it from being crushed then face a pack of wolves. Kyle abandons a snow mobile and struggles to get home amidst the chaos.

programme.title: Ice Lake Rebels
programme.desc: Pike Mike falls into perilously cold water and has only minutes to be rescued. Kyle and Peyton find a bear near their home and reconsider houseboat living. Stephan causes a fire that may destroy everything.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: When the Browns welcome a trio of ostrich chicks to the ranch, a ravenous bear stalks the property in search of its next meal. Later, a determined wolf pack is taken to dangerous new heights when salvaging and transporting a 50-foot windmill.

programme.title: Yukon Men
programme.desc: The largest wildfire in Alaskan history torches the land surrounding Tanana and threatens to devour the village. With state resources spread thin, the villagers must band together to battle the blaze or risk losing everything.

programme.title: Yukon Men
programme.desc: After Alaska's largest wildfire ravages Tanana, the villagers must adapt their subsistence lifestyles to a new, even harsher reality. Two young homesteaders embark upon a dangerous journey in the hopes of starting a new life on the Cosna.

programme.title: Ice Cold Gold
programme.desc: Sixty Degree Resources, a small American mining company, returned to Greenland for another battle with the beast.

programme.title: Ice Cold Gold
programme.desc: The American miners have their sights set on what team geologist Eric Drummond believes could be the largest ruby deposit in the Arctic. But Greenland's wild frontier soon plays havoc as the team struggles to return to its prized claim from last year.

programme.title: Coyote Peterson: Brave the Wild
programme.desc: Coyote Peterson heads to the swamplands of Texas in search of a giant alligator snapping turtle known as Raphael. Coyote is determined to prove that this turtle is the largest living creature of his kind.

programme.title: Hanging With the Hendersons
programme.desc: Colorado's Fox Hollow Animal Hospital is run by an endearing family of vets. Dr. Tony Henderson, and his sons Dr. Ross, Dr. Ryan and Cole, tackle everything from wonky-eyed chickens to a great dane with a funky tail.

programme.title: Hanging With the Hendersons
programme.desc: Dr. Ross has his hands full when a sick dog is rushed to the clinic after eating a bag of pot. Dr. Tony and Dr. Ross help a pot-bellied pig rescue with some plus-sized problems. And, as Natalia and Dr. Ryan's wedding approaches, it's time to meet mom.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Dr. Ross treats baby kangaroos and links up with the owners of a petting zoo to hold a fun event at the clinic to promote animal awareness. Dr. Blue removes a mass from a beloved pit-mix, and Dr. Lavigne treats a vision and hearing impaired Great Dane.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Dr. Ross and vet tech Kyerra rush into action to save a stray cat that's been brutally mangled by a car engine. The Ross' move into their new home while Dr. Blue treats a 700lb arthritic pig. Dr. Lavigne sees a rescue Chihuahua with an incredible story.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Dr. Blue needs to act fast when a Rottweiler in labour is rushed into the hospital with two puppies stuck inside her. Then, the three vets grab the reins and their cowboys hats to ride horseback into town for Houston's biggest rodeo parade.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: The docs visit their alma mater for a class reunion and become professors for a day. A Shih Tzu is rushed to the clinic after swallowing a large piece of rawhide while the owner of pit bull with a deformed leg must consider drastic surgery.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Dr. Blue surprises his wife with a romantic wedding vow renewal in Las Vegas. A Schnauzer boarding at the clinic needs medical help from Dr. Lavigne. Dr. Ross treats a very ornery parrot, and a senior dog with a recurring eye mass visits Dr. Blue again.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Dr. Blue's love of fish has him wanting a home aquarium. Dr. Ross attempts to diagnose Layla, a Lab with bizarre test results, while Dr. Lavigne performs knee surgery on a bulldog. A lamb, headed to the county fair, suddenly has breathing problems.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Dr. Ross starts off the day with a trio of mischievous ferrets suffering from a skin condition. Bella, a 9-year-old Shepherd, is diagnosed with an extremely large tumor, and her family is faced with difficult decisions throughout her treatment.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: On the Gulf, oyster boats and fish retailers are inspected. Outside San Antonio, a poacher is caught after posting pictures. In East Texas, Game Wardens patrol deer camps and help a pelican in distress.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A couple is suspected of killing a deer during off-season. Warden Iles transports orphaned baby armadillos for rehabilitation, and Warden Gould searches for a mountain lion that is lurking near a recreational park in Laredo.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A game warden has a run-in with an acrobatic squirrel. A Mexican shrimp boat may have an illegal catch. Fishing without a license leads to a trip to jail. A mystery UTV caught-on-tape has a surprising driver. Some kids are found in a dangerous situation.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: In Llano County, a jet skier's life is spared after an explosion on the water. When a man fakes his own death, Warden Herchman and Stapleton join forces to track him down, and a man is found trespassing while fishing.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Uncuffed
programme.desc: An investigation sparks when Warden McDermott discovers an abandoned truck, and a group of paddlers are rescued from their capsized canoe. On "Old Home Day", Warden Demler patrols the ATV trails, and an injured barred owl gets a second chance.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Newly promoted Sgt. Lucas shows Trainee Frye the ropes during a busy ATV weekend. Hannett attempts to rescue an injured heron and later faces off with a moose. And lost hikers turn to Holmes for help as the sun goes down and temperatures drop.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: When Maine's wildlife wanders into human territory, it's game wardens to the rescue. Wardens Marquis and Fitzpatrick try to catch a dumpster-diving bear. A wily woodchuck gives Warden Lounder a run for his money.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Uncuffed
programme.desc: The New Hampshire Conservation Officers are equipped to handle any situation that nature can throw at them, including a dangers timber rattlesnake, and a family of skunks that have been separated.

programme.title: North Woods Law

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A Facebook post leads the wardens to a gang of poachers, which turns into a manhunt when the ringleader skips bail. The wardens capture a flock of nuisance wild turkeys and search all night for a rabbit hunter lost in the snowy woods.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A sledder takes a jump that lands him in the hospital and the wardens investigate the crash. The wardens chase down a group of drunk snowmobilers. A strange pile of animal parts in the snow leads the wardens to a family of poachers.

programme.desc: Parker Schnabel is forced to call his dad in to help his struggling operation, Todd Hoffman has the best clean-up of the season and Tony Beets' daughter Monica starts bringing home the gold.

programme.title: Gold Rush

programme.title: Gold Rush

programme.title: Homestead Rescue

programme.desc: In Huntington Beach, Darrell's insider information amplifies his investment considerably. Mary’s find cooks up some oversized accoutrements. Kenny takes advantage of others’ missteps to grab a unit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: This time, Darrell might be at risk of losing the title of 'The King of Montebello.' Brandi and Jarrod find their way back to the auction with the help of some pocket tech. Casey bails himself out despite being confined with an infectious German.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The parking lot is tiny in Van Nuys, and Mary needs a little help managing it. Dave picks up a locker that turns out to be therapeutic, while Justin tries to show the rest of them how to make the most out of a unit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: It's 'prison' hugs all around in the City of Orange. Brandi and Jarrod bring an old friend along to do the heavy lifting. Ivy finds his fun in the little things. Shana and Edwina crack themselves up with some snappy accessories.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Rolling into Buena Park with their crew, Brandi and Jarrod pick up what may be the best of the worst. Kenny and his cousin glide through a locker that's only half decent. Ivy comes to the auction dressed to kill. Mary tries to turn up the volume.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Moreno Valley, Emily brings along her cowboy husband. Ivy is displeased at Mary’s fraternization with the auctioneer, and takes it out on her later.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The Vegas Ladies show up in "Bourgie Brea," and find the place fascinating. Mary decides to deal with her storage stress by introducing a bit of yoga into her routine. Ivy and Dave go head-to-head on a giant pair of sister lockers.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Victorville, Ivy takes it easy, letting Ivy Jr. run the operation. Kenny feels run down and his lack of focus lands him a locker, though there's a pleasant surprise in the end. Mary, Shana and Edwina just can’t seem to make anything stick.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: It's a momentous occasion in Van Nuys for Darrell, and he has a completely groovy time with it. Ivy starts his day off with an unwelcome bang. Brandi and Jarrod are left wondering whether their unit will bring clear skies or clouds ahead.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers travel to Torrance and Dave sees an increase in his profits. It's positive news when Mary discovers some clothes that don't fit. Kenny tries a be an early bird, but winds up becoming the dodo.

programme.desc: When a wealthy woman is found dead at the bottom of her stairs, we realize that this was no ordinary slip-and-fall accident. The team is pressed into a game of cat and mouse with a clever killer determined to get away with the perfect crime.

programme.title: Rizzoli & Isles
programme.desc: Jane and Maura must unravel an old ghost story in order to solve a double murder at a hospital. Angela convinces Frankie to stop avoiding Kent and accept his invitation to a concert.

programme.desc: The eldest brother in a Boston Brahmin family is found in the harbour dead after an apparent sailing accident. Maura's close connection with the family and Jane's resentment over their wealth threaten to derail the investigation.

programme.desc: The Boston Marathon turns into a crime scene when a shooter begins targeting runners. Racing to catch the killer before another shooting, Jane and Maura must conduct their investigation in secret to avoid panic.

programme.desc: Restoring a Split Window Corvette runs into unexpected problems. The owner of a '63 Corvette never had time or money to keep it running. After dozens of swap meets searching for the parts to rebuild the car, he's still nowhere close.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: While the junkyard is thriving, Andy puts his focus on the promotion of the auto shop. Taking on ambitious projects puts the reputation of Damascus Motors at risk, but could lead to great success.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Andy Cohen built an empire out of a junkyard but as his business booms, Andy risks losing his grip. First, his well-meaning father screws up a big repair job. Then, mechanical problems arise with his race car.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: When Andy Cohen sees an opportunity to make money, he seizes it, even if it means selling off one of his most valuable cars. But first, he has to fix it and some jobs aren't as easy as they seem.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Andy Cohen believes it's bad business to turn down business, even when the job at hand seems impossible. When a returning client approaches him with an ambitious build and an impossible deadline, Andy might find himself backed into a corner.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Andy thinks he's got an easy new way to make money by selling tricked out golf carts to all of his Dad's buddies. Bobby is excited about the carts too and encourages Andy to build one but when the kit arrives Andy realizes it's harder than he thought.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Andy's vision for big ideas leads to a huge opportunity for the shop. If he pulls off the build as promised, he could secure future business for years to come. And with a little help from his dad, he has the opportunity to boost his own collection.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: As a child, Andy Cohen spent hours playing with his Hot Wheels. So Andy sees it as the build of a lifetime when Hot Wheels' legendary car designer Larry Wood, one of his idols, asks him to build him a life-size replica of one of his designs.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Tony Angelo and Lucky Costa take their trusty shop truck, the Crown Hick, a 1966 Ford F-100 sitting on a 2007 Crown Victoria complete chassis, and add boost for more power.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: The Drift 'Cuda is back! Project #fishtail, Tony Angelo's dream drift muscle car build, gets some suspension upgrades and sees some track time.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A beauty of a car from Kindig's past arrives back in the shop for an engine upgrade. Dave and Kevin make a trip to Detroit to see the latest technology at Lingenfelter engine builders, and check out the Woodward Dream Cruise.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: A long-time customer wants to make a statement by having his stock 2017 F250 Platinum 4x4 lifted and made off-road ready. The boys from Texas are happy to oblige with a handmade 22-inch lift on 42-inch custom tires.

programme.title: AutoBiography
programme.desc: Just moments after finishing his first drive in the most famous racing Porsche on earth, the new owner gets a visit from the last people he expected to see at Laguna Seca raceway: the DEA. Shockingly, no one is surprised.

programme.title: AutoBiography
programme.desc: The Bugatti Type 57G Tank, and the Prototype Shelby Cobra Daytona Coupe, both legendary and priceless cars, have more than speed records and world championships in common: they were both locked away under bizarre circumstances, and nearly forgotten.

programme.title: AutoBiography
programme.desc: The world's most famous Ferrari crash happened on February 22nd, 2006 when a Ferrari Enzo split in half on the PCH in Malibu, California, and both passengers emerged unharmed. But the tale of Split Enzo morphed quickly into a bizarre crime story.

programme.title: AutoBiography
programme.desc: Mulholland Drive in Los Angeles, California is one of the most famous and most treacherous roads in the world. In the 1960s-1980s it was home to movie stars, rock stars, and some of the most dangerous illegal street racing in America.

programme.title: AutoBiography
programme.desc: Three famous movie cars, a submarine Lotus, an armed Aston Martin, and a killer's Chevy Malibu, end up driving away from their fantasy big screen lives and into real experiences of James Bond level break-ins, underworld theft, and high-tech modifications.

programme.title: AutoBiography
programme.desc: In the summer of 1984, retired Major General William Lyon and his son Bill knock on the door of an abandoned roller rink in suburban San Diego. What they find inside may be the former car of one of the most evil men in history.

programme.title: AutoBiography
programme.desc: 40 years after they went missing, a 1969 Camaro and a 1952 Chevy Styleline are found side by side at the bottom of a Lake in western Oklahoma. No one knows how they ended up there, or why the three people in each car didn't escape, until now.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The build on the Pontiac Tempest continues, as bodywork wraps up and Dave has designed a killer new color. Kevin shows off his powder-coating skills, and the client has a tough decision to make on the color combo for the interior.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Bill and the guys transform a completely wrecked 2017 F150. Ekstensive breathes life into this hunk of parts, turning it into an angry-looking, one of one prerunner. They also build a custom air suspension bike trailer for a long-time customer.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: Brian has a 1968 Chevelle Malibu that has been abused and used for parts. Now that he's grown up and realises what he's got he wants a second chance and hopes the Garage Squad can help.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: Danielle's 1968 Chevy Camaro 327 convertible was her dream car, but now it's her nightmare needing an overhaul from bumper to bumper. She lost all hope.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Known for their killer cool paint jobs, MBC flips this build on its head. A weather beaten 59 Metro rolls into the shop for an extreme makeover, from the inside out. It's the Flintstones meets the Jetsons with a surprise twist for its new owner.

programme.title: Bitchin' Bootcamp
programme.desc: Dave and KevDogg keep the pressure on, as the remaining competitors pair up for a challenge to create a signature Kindig-It build feature. Teamwork is critical, and the team that can't figure it out will pack their bags.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A returning client is back with another classic, a 1965 Mustang Fastback. He likes to keep a stock look, but with updated drivetrain, instrumentation and as many modern amenities as possible. Plus, the assembly team gets a crash course in engine turning.

programme.title: Bitchin' Bootcamp
programme.desc: The day's first exercise is to take an hour and see if they are more of a Dave or Kev artist. Next, project managers are chosen from the group and tasked to lead a team to design and execute a wing on a '68 Camaro trunk lid.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Never before seen footage and Inside Perspective from the crew take viewers behind the build of a 2013 Mr. Norm's Challenger, a '48 Studebaker gets a new rear suspension that will tear the flames right off the truck.

programme.desc: It's as real as it gets. Country Outdoors takes you inside the home of Josh Turner, one of country music's brightest stars, for an exclusive live performance.

programme.title: Farming the Wild
programme.desc: Mike and his wife Claude visit Scotland to shoot red deer hinds with the help of guide Nail. Back at the restaurant, Mike makes fennel sausages and cooks them on his BBQ at home with a light bean dish.

programme.title: Longmire
programme.desc: While Walt interviews candidates for the vacant deputy position, he investigates a series of robberies involving stolen pharmaceuticals and a veterans recovery group run by psychiatrist Dr. Donna Monaghan.

programme.title: Nick's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Nick rides into the Montana backcountry with the McAtee family. He explores not only their family's long relationship with these mountains but also the incredible story of the cowboys that made this part of the country famous.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Uncharted: Yukon
programme.desc: Jim and Roddy struggle to get their clients a moose nearing the end of their hunts while Bryan gets his client an early moose and is able to shift focus to hunting a bear.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: A white knuckle passage stands between the Time Bandit and their final offload.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna
programme.desc: As Gloucester's bluefin tuna fleet charges into the heart of the fishing season, it's a tight race for the coveted title of top-earning boat.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Uncharted: Yukon
programme.desc: Jim and Roddy struggle to get their clients a moose nearing the end of their hunts while Bryan gets his client an early moose and is able to shift focus to hunting a bear.

programme.title: The Fowl Life With Chad Belding
programme.desc: Chad finally gets a weather break in Arkansas and his favorite honey hole is open: Prairie Wings Duck Club near the Bayou Meto. In camp is Chase Outlaw, world champion bull rider, to teach us a thing or two about toughness.

programme.title: The Flush
programme.desc: Scott Fransen pays tribute to bird dogs of 'The Flush,' then says goodbye to his beloved, Izzy.

programme.title: Roger Raglin Outdoors
programme.desc: Roger takes you back to hunts in Kentucky, Texas and Oklahoma, including his biggest w/t bow kill ever, an 183 incher, from the ground at 18 yards.

programme.title: Raised Hunting
programme.desc: A Montana archery elk hunt gives Warren and David a clear understanding of what we are, and what we are not entitled to in this earth.

programme.title: Bone Collector
programme.desc: Nick Mundt and Cohen Stone head to a very special place in the heart of Alaska known as Geezer Ridge.

programme.title: Hunt Masters
programme.desc: After hearing talks of a potential world record moose sighting, Gregg Ritz returns to the Yukon and is guided by a legend.

programme.title: Bow Madness
programme.desc: Brandon Jennings and Dave Kramer are on the hunt for the elusive elk. After many close calls for both hunters over the years, they are hoping this is the year they find success on the bugling, towering western elk.

programme.title: Farming the Wild
programme.desc: Mike and his wife Claude visit Scotland to shoot red deer hinds with the help of guide Nail. Back at the restaurant, Mike makes fennel sausages and cooks them on his BBQ at home with a light bean dish.

programme.title: Nick's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Nick rides into the Montana backcountry with the McAtee family. He explores not only their family's long relationship with these mountains but also the incredible story of the cowboys that made this part of the country famous.

programme.title: The Bucks of Tecomate
programme.desc: Gary shares his great La Perla Ranch with his son-in-law who is hunting the biggest buck of his life.

programme.title: Addicted to the Outdoors
programme.desc: When it comes to hunting Wisconsin, the Brunson's favorite place that is second to none is their good friend Johnny O's.

programme.title: Dirt Trax TV
programme.desc: AJ and Luke get their hands on the new Yamaha Wolverine RMAX as they spend the day putting the vehicle through its paces.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: It's week two of the season, and boats are hunting down the elusive King crab; a vicious storm kicks up and a Mayday goes out; the Skippers are glued to their radios, waiting to hear the fate of eleven brother fishermen in distress.

programme.title: North American Whitetail
programme.desc: Dr. James Kroll and Rob Hughes hunt Texas' Bar J Ranch with their Browning rifles. The importance of patience in land management is the subject of our 'Build Your Own Deer Factory.

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.desc: Michael Waddell and local fire man, Michael Pitts, put in a ton of work to get mature Georgia Whitetails with in bow range.

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: Mike and Bonnie are back in south Texas chasing hit list bucks, and scouting new areas on the farm.

programme.title: Headhunters
programme.desc: Randy Birdsong starts bowhunting elk in New Mexico and ends his season on a coveted Wyoming tag.

programme.title: Gun Stories
programme.desc: Joe Mantegna discusses the history of firearms, from design to use on the range.

programme.title: Guns and Ammo
programme.desc: We have the Davidson's Exclusive Ruger PC Carbine in 9mm at The Range. We test the gas rings in the Midway USA AR Stoner line. In our Small Arms of WW1 series, we take a look at the Pugsley anti-tank gun.

programme.title: American Archer
programme.desc: Joe heads to Florida on a mission to eradicate feral hogs for the landowners.

programme.title: Heartland Bowhunter
programme.desc: Skyler and his dad, Mike, are headed to the Missouri Breaks of Montana for the first time chasing elk with Flatwillow Creek Outfitters. This area is known for producing trophy elk and the season is just getting started.

programme.title: Realtree Outdoors
programme.desc: The Realtree crew and friends return to Seven J Outfitters for the 25th year in a row to bowhunt the first week of the Wyoming archery season.

programme.title: The Crush with Lee and Tiffany
programme.desc: We're back at one of our favorite places to hunt down south. Bring on the heat and the giant early season whitetails.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna
programme.desc: In the last week of the season, the closest race in Wicked Tuna history will come down to the final catch.

programme.title: Primos Truth About Hunting
programme.desc: Our good friend Will Walker is in camp, and waiting for his arrival is Ol' Lake Pickle. Lake has some well-earned MRI for Walker when he arrives and these two waste no time rolling right into a rut ball of bulls and cows.

programme.title: Inside Outdoors TV
programme.desc: When Covid-19 shuts down the Northern border, we're left to reminisce the last 8 years of our Canadian bear hunts.

programme.title: Bowhunter TV
programme.desc: Bowhunter assistant editor Brian Fortenbaugh takes the best buck of his life during a week of frenzied whitetail rut action in Saskatchewan.

programme.title: Ted Nugent Spirit of the Wild
programme.desc: Ted does his patriotic duty and travels to Ringle, Wisconsin for the very first Hunt the Vote rally.

programme.title: Game Keepers
programme.desc: The one where the gamekeepers show you how it all started at Mossy Oak.

programme.title: Critical Mass
programme.desc: The "October Lull" is anything but as mature bucks are on the move in multiple states.
